EffectPre: Conjure an additional Spirit Companion adjacent to an enemy within 6 squares of you (this happens before declaring targets for this attack). This Spirit lasts until end of your next turn.
Upgrades:
Upgrade 13: Increase Hit damage to 2d8+Wis
Upgrade 23: Increase Hit damage to 3d8+Wis

Name: Taunting Roar
Hit: 2d8+Wis, and the Spirit and Spirit's allies adjacent to it gain Con SP.
EffectPost: Until end of your next turn, your Spirit gains Aura 1: enemies in Aura are Taunted.
Upgrades:
Upgrade 13: Increase Hit damage to 2d8+Wis
Upgrade 23: Increase Hit damage to 3d8+Wis

Name: Predator Charge
Hit: 1d8+Wis, and until end of next turn Shocked and grants Advantage.
EffectPost: Teleport your Spirit to a square adjacent to the other end of the Line.
Upgrades:
Upgrade 13: Increase Hit damage to 2d8+Wis
Upgrade 23: Increase Hit damage to 3d8+Wis

Name: Rallying Roar
EffectPost: Until end of your next turn, your Spirit gains Aura 1: Allies in Aura deal +Int damage against Bloodied enemies.
Upgrades:
Upgrade 13: Increase Hit damage to 3d8+Wis
Upgrade 23: Increase Hit damage to 4d8+Wis

Name: Earth to Mud
Hit: 2d8+Wis, and Slowed until end of your next turn.
EffectPost: Until end of your next turn, your Spirit gains Aura 1: Spaces in Aura are Difficult Terrain.
Upgrades:
Upgrade 13: Increase Hit damage to 3d8+Wis.
Upgrade 23: Increase Hit damage to 4d8+Wis. Increase Aura to Aura 2.

Name: Spirit of Frenzy
EffectPost: Until the end of the encounter, your Spirit gains Aura 1: attacks from the Spirit's allies against enemies in aura have +1 Crit Range
Upgrades:
Upgrade 15: Increase Hit damage to 5d8+Wis
Upgrade 23: Increase Hit damage to 7d8+Wis

Name: Spirit of Allure
EffectPost: Until the end of the encounter, your Spirit gains Aura 2: When an enemy in the aura is hit, Pull 1 towards Spirit
Upgrades:
Upgrade 15: Increase Hit damage to 2d10+Wis. Increase range to Close Spirit Burst 3.
Upgrade 23: Increase Hit damage to 3d10+Wis. Increase Aura to Aura 3. Increase pull from Hit and from Aura effect to Pull 2.

Name: Spirit of Alacrity
Hit: 3d8+Wis Lightning. Until the end of the encounter, your Spirit gains Aura 2: At the end of each of your turns in which you hit an enemy, allies in the aura gain Advantage against any enemy you hit that turn, and may Slide 1.
Upgrades:
Upgrade 15: Increase Hit damage to 5d8+Wis. Increase Aura to Aura 3.
Upgrade 23: Increase Hit damage to 7d8+Wis. Increase Aura slide to Slide 2.

Name: Spirit of Youth
EffectPost: Your Spirit gains SP equal to the damage dealt. Until the end of the encounter, your Spirit gains Aura 1: Allies of the Spirit in aura gain Regeneration: Con.
Upgrades:
Upgrade 15: Increase Hit damage to 5d6+Wis
Upgrade 23: Increase Hit damage to 7d6+Wis. Increase Aura to Aura 2.

Name: Spirit of Tremors
EffectPost: Until the end of the encounter, your Spirit gains Aura 1: Spaces in Aura are Difficult Terrain for enemies. Enemies in aura are knocked prone when hit.
Upgrades:
Upgrade 15: Increase Hit damage to 3d6+Wis. Increase range to Burst 2.
Upgrade 23: Increase Hit damage to 4d8+Wis. Increase aura to Aura 2.

Name: Spirit of Hope
Hit: 3d6+Wis Radiant. Until the end of the encounter, your Spirit gains Aura 1: At the end of each of your turns in which you hit an enemy, the Spirit's allies in the aura can Roll a Save.
Upgrades:
Upgrade 15: Increase Hit damage to 5d6+Wis. Spirit's allies in aura also gain +2 to Saves.
Upgrade 23: Increase Hit damage to 7d6+Wis. Increase Aura to Aura 2.

Name: Spirit Gate
EffectPost: The target and your Spirit teleport to switch places.
Misc: Special: Requires an active Spirit Companion.

Name: Fortify Spirit
EffectPost: The Spirit and any allies of the Spirit adjacent to it gain Con SP.

Name: Spirit Winds
EffectPost: The Spirit and any allies of the Spirit adjacent to it can Slide 2.

Name: Elven Accuracy
Trigger: You miss an enemy with an attack
EffectPost: You reroll the attack against the triggering enemy.

Name: Cloud Elf Flight
EffectPost: You Fly 7. This movement does not provoke Opportunity Attacks.

Name: Halfling Dodge
EffectPost: The next time an enemy attack hits you before the end of the encounter, reroll the attack with -1 Crit Range.

Name: Elvish Charm
Target: targets an enemy you haven't attacked this turn.
EffectPost:
You Charm the target until end of your next turn.
(A Charmed enemy can't attack you, is not affected by your Taunts, and doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks from you. Effect ends when you attack the target).

Name: Orc Smash
EffectPost: The next time you hit an enemy before the end of the encounter, deal +1d8 and Push 3.

Name: Dragon Breath
Misc: Special: When you gain this power, choose Fire, Cold, Lightning, Poison or Physical. This attack deals damage of that type.

Name: Diabolic Shield
EffectPost: Until end of next turn, gain Cover, and enemies attacking you take Fire damage equal to your primary ability.

Name: Gnomish Trick
EffectPre:
Choose one:
The target grants Advantage until your next turn.
The target is Dazzled until your next turn.

Name: Diabolic Shield
EffectPost: Until end of next turn, gain Cover, and enemies attacking you take Fire damage equal to your primary ability.

Name: See Red
EffectPost: Until end of the Encounter, gain -1 to all Defenses, and when attacking Bloodied enemies gain +1 Hit and +1 Crit Range.

Name: Goliath Resistance
EffectPost: Until end of next turn, gain Resist (All)

Name: Shifty Kobold
EffectPost: Shift 1

Name: Name
EffectPost: EffectPost

Name: Melee Basic Attack (Weapon)
EffectPost: NA
Upgrades: Level 21: Increase Hit damage to 2W+Primary Ability.
Summary: Attack with a weapon in melee

Name: Ranged Basic Attack (Weapon)
EffectPost: NA
Upgrades: Level 21: Increase Hit damage to 2W+Primary Ability.
Summary: Attack with a weapon at range

Name: Ranged Basic Attack (Implement)
EffectPost: NA
Upgrades: Level 21: Increase Hit damage to 2d6+Primary Ability.
Summary: Attack with an implement at range

Name: Second Wind
EffectPost: Heal a Surge. Gain +4 to all defenses until your next turn.
Summary: (Encounter) Heal a Surge. +4 to all defenses until next turn.

Name: Use Action Point
EffectPost: Make an Action Point Check. If successful, you can spend an Action Point to gain an extra Standard Action.
Misc: (You can only spend one Action Point per encounter.)
Summary: Make Action Point Check to spend an Action Point.

Name: Opportunity Attack
Trigger: An adjacent enemy moves or makes a Ranged or Area attack
EffectPost: You make a Melee Basic Attack against the triggering enemy, adding your Opportunity Modifier to the Hit Roll
Summary: Reaction attack against adjacent enemy shifting or using ranged attacks.

Name: Total Defense
EffectPost: Gain +4 to all defenses until your next turn.
Summary: +4 to all defenses until end of next turn.

Name: Shift
EffectPost: Shift 1. If you move away from an adjacent enemy this way, you are Hindered this turn.

Name: Draw
EffectPost: Move 1. Sheathe or store any number of items from your hands. Draw, or pick up from the ground, up to one item per hand.
Summary: Move 1. Sheathe items, then draw items.

Name: Quick Draw
EffectPost: Drop any number of items from your hands. Draw up to one item per hand. You are Hindered this turn.
Summary: Drop Items, then draw items. Hindered.

Name: Point Blank Shot
EffectPost: Until end of turn, you are Hindered, and making Ranged or Area attacks targeting adjacent enemies does not provoke opportunity attacks
Summary: Hindered, and can use Ranged attack in melee.

Name: Raise the Alarm
EffectPost: Each Surprised target can Roll a Save against the Surprised condition.

Name: Charge
EffectPost: You are Hindered this turn. Move your Speed and make a Melee Basic Attack. You can't move this turn
Summary: Hindered and Dazed. Move Speed and make Melee Basic Attack.

Name: Stand Up
EffectPost: You stop being Prone, and you are Hindered this turn. Move 1

Name: Run
EffectPost: Move your Speed +4. You are Dazed until the start of your next turn.
Summary: Move Speed+4, and Dazed until next turn.

Name: Escape
EffectPost: Use only while Grabbed. You are Hindered this turn. Roll a Save to stop being Grabbed by one enemy. If you are larger than the Grabbing enemy, gain a +3 bonus to the save for each size category difference.
Summary: Roll save to stop being Grabbed by an enemy.

Name: First Aid
EffectPost: The target is no longer Dying.
Summary: Melee, targets a Dying ally. No longer Dying.

Name: Administer Potion
EffectPost: The target uses a Potion carried or held by you or the target.
Summary: Melee, targets an ally. Use Potion on target.

Name: Ready Melee Attack
AttackRoll: Until your next turn, the first time an enemy you can see moves to a square adjacent to you, they provoke an opportunity attack from you.
EffectPre: You can use this attack only if there are no enemies you can see adjacent to you.
Summary: Gain Opportunity Attack to next enemy moving into melee range.

Name: Ready Ranged Attack
AttackRoll: Until your next turn, you are Hindered, and the first time an enemy you can see moves to a square within Long Range of your Ranged Basic Attack, you can make a Ranged Basic Attack as a Reaction (Interrupt) against them
EffectPre: You can use this attack only if there are no enemies you can see within Long Range of your Ranged Basic Attack.
Summary: Gain Reaction Ranged Basic Attack to next enemy moving into range. Hindered until next turn.

Name: Pierce
EffectPost: Choose an enemy you can see and name a type of resistance. On your attacks against that enemy this turn, that resistance is downgraded. You are Hindered this turn.
Summary: Downgrade a resistance against your attacks. Hindered.

Name: Drag
EffectPost:
You are Hindered this turn. Move, then Pull all enemies Grabbed by you that many squares. This movement does not provoke Opportunity Attacks from enemies Grabbed by you, and it does not end the Grab. The distance moved depends of the size of the largest enemy Grabbed by you:
- Enemy 2 or more sizes smaller than you: Move half your speed.
- Enemy your size, 1 size smaller than you or 1 size larger than you: Move 1.
- Enemy 2 or more sizes larger than you: Can't move.
Upgrades: Special: Use only if you are Grabbing an enemy.
Summary: While Grabbing, move and pull enemies.

Name: Climb
EffectPost: Climb 1.

Name: Swim
EffectPost: Swim 1.

Name: Crawl
EffectPost: Crawl 1.

Name: Balance
EffectPost: Move 1 over narrow or slippery terrain.

Name: Long Jump
EffectPost: Move half your Speed. If you are 2 or more squares away from your starting position, Long Jump 2.

Name: High Jump
EffectPost: Move half your Speed. If you are 2 or more squares away from your starting position, High Jump 1.

Name: Drop
EffectPost: Move 1. If you fall during this movement, treat the fall if the fall distance was 1 less. You can choose to become Prone
Summary: Move 1, fall as if from 1 less square, you may drop Prone.

Name: Enshroud
EffectPost: If you are in Cover (other than Body Cover) or Concealment from all enemies, you become Shrouded. If you were already Shrouded, you become Hidden instead.

Name: Hide
EffectPost:
If you are in Cover (other than Body Cover) or Concealment from all enemies, make a Medium Stealth check. On a success, you become Hidden.
DC modifiers:
- +1/+2/+3: Nearby enemies Trained/Master/Grandmaster in Perception (use highest).
- +1: You are within 4 squares of an enemy.
- -1: You have Total Cover or Total Concealment from all enemies.
Summary: If in Cover/Concealment, make Stealth check to become Hidden.

Name: Spot
EffectPost:
Shrouded enemies within 2 or less squares of you are no longer Shrouded.
Hidden enemies within 2 or less squares of you become Shrouded instead.

Name: Sneak
EffectPost: Special: Use only while Shrouded or Hidden. Effect: Move half your Speed. This movement does not cause you to lose Shrouded or Hidden.

Name: Search
EffectPost:
If there are any Hidden or Shrouded enemies nearby, make a Medium Perception check. On a success, they are no longer Hidden or Shrouded.
DC modifiers:
- +1/+2/+3: Hidden enemies Trained/Master/Grandmaster in Stealth (use highest).
- -1: You are within 4 squares of a Hidden enemy.
- +1: Hidden enemies have Total Cover or Total Concealment from you.
Summary: Make Perception Check to find Hidden/Shrouded enemies.

Name: Righteous Smite
Hit: 2W, and you and allies within 2 squares gain Cha+Wis SP.
EffectPost: NA
Upgrades:
Upgrade 13: Increase Hit damage to 2W
Upgrade 25: Increase Hit damage to 3W

Name: Lightning Burst
EffectPost: NA
